claims.label: Mixed
claims.explanation: No qualifying evidence; defaulting to Mixed.

counter_claims.text: Reported change is mis-stated; the underlying dataset shows a different magnitude or direction.
counter_claims.rationale: Invert/verify direction & magnitude; check base period and comp (YoY vs MoM).

counter_claims.text: Claim over-generalizes; the statement applies to a subset (time window, geography, department) not the whole.
counter_claims.rationale: Enforce scope precision: who/where/when; look for definitions, exclusions, footnotes.

counter_claims.text: Observed change is confounded by external factors (policy timing, accounting changes, one-off items).
counter_claims.rationale: Causality caution; correlate with contemporaneous events and reporting lags.
